Row.Text: Adds better ribbon information to the game.[N]This is a single mod which includes 3 of izica's mods:[LIST][LI] • Player production[LI] • Player population / citizens[LI] • Player combat power[/LIST]
izica's mods:[LIST][LI] • Player production[LI] • Player population / citizens[LI] • Player combat power[/LIST]
This should be compatible with all other mods.
